body.p: Contributor list XML, based on the TEI bare customization.

div.head: Basic document structure
div.p: A contributor document has a very simple form. The root element is j:contributor. There is no TEI header. It contains, in order:

list.item: A required single idno element, the database identifier of the contributor

An optional name or orgName element, giving the real name (or pseudonym) of the contributor, or the contributing organization. The name element should contain name parts, such as forename and surname.
Optional contact information, such as email address or postal address.
Optional organization affiliation, which may contain an orgName element as well.

div.head: Class modifications
div.p: The class modifications are the same as those used in TEI bare. Only the xml:id, n, and xml:lang attributes are allowed globally.
